strings.string: Select if you wish to LOGIN to a XinBox Account. If no accounts have been created, then you must CREATE an XinBox Account before logging in.
Select if you wish to CREATE a new XinBox Account. A XinBox account is required to LOGIN.
Select if you wish to CHANGE the XinBox settings.
Select if you wish to find out ABOUT the XinBox script.
Select if you wish to EXIT the XinBox script and return to XBMC.
